document_data.name: Bag of Nails
document_data.mainbody: '''Bag of Nails''' was a [[tabaxi]] that lived in [[Chult]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. As of the year of the [[death curse]], he dwelled within an abandoned building in the lost city of [[Omu]].
document_data.Activities: He came to Omu to find a fabled treasure called the [[Navel of the Moon]]. He hoped to use its alleged powers to find his lost son, but he eventually gave up hope of ever finding it.
document_data.Personality: In his older years, Bag of Nails wished to receive a death worthy of a hunter. In truth he had lost his mind to senility and began seeing every individual he met as his quarry.
document_data.Possessions: He was in the possession of the poison known as ''[[midnight tears]]''
document_data.History: At some time, Bag of Nails traveled to [[Omu]] in order to find the artifact known as the ''[[Navel of the Moon]]'', in the hopes that it would allow him to find his long-lost son. After a long search, he gave up hope on his quest.
